Pre-Game Insights: CJ McCollum is the leading scorer in the NBA so far in 2025, averaging 36.0 points per game. He also ranks second in scoring average over the last four games, with an average of 34.3 points on 57% shooting from the field and 51% three-point accuracy.
Miscellaneous Highlights: This will be the fourth game between the New Orleans Pelicans and Washington Wizards this season.
Others: Dejounte Murray, CJ McCollum, Herb Jones, Trey Murphy, and Yves Missi are the starting lineup for the New Orleans Pelicans. Brandon Boston, Jordan Poole, Justin Champagnie, Kyle Kuzma, and Alex Sarr are the starting lineup for the Washington Wizards.
